scripts.server: cd server && npm install && node index.js
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-fe: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.full-build: npm run build-fe && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
